languages.text: Варп — коварная и злокозненная тварь, Лорд-капитан. Теперь мы готовы свидетельствовать это. Ему понравилось, что мы признали свое поражение. Потому он выпустил нас назад. И мы верим, что причина тому лишь одна — здесь нас ждет еще худшая погибель.

traits.locale_text: Варп — коварная и злокозненная тварь, Лорд-Капитан. Теперь мы готовы свидетельствовать это. Ему понравилось, что мы признали свое поражение. Потому он выпустил нас назад. И мы верим, что причина тому лишь одна — здесь нас ждет еще худшая погибель.

languages.text: The warp is a sly and insidious beast, Lord Captain. We are ready to acknowledge that now. It was pleased that we admitted our defeat. That is why it let us come back. And we believe there can be only one reason for that — an even worse fate awaits us here.
languages.original_text: Варп — коварная и злокозненная тварь, Лорд-капитан. Теперь мы готовы свидетельствовать это. Ему понравилось, что мы признали свое поражение. Потому он выпустил нас назад. И мы верим, что причина тому лишь одна — здесь нас ждет еще худшая погибель.

traits.locale_text: The warp is a sly and insidious beast, Lord Captain. We are ready to acknowledge that now. It was pleased that we admitted our defeat. That is why it let us come back. And we believe there can be only one reason for that — an even worse fate awaits us here.

The warp is a sly and insidious beast, Lord Captain. We are ready to acknowledge that now. It was pleased that we admitted our defeat. That is why it let us come back. And we believe there can be only one reason for that — an even worse fate awaits us here.

The warp is a sly and insidious beast, Lord Captain. We are ready to acknowledge that now. It was pleased that we admitted our defeat. That is why it let us come back. And we believe there can be only one reason for that — an even worse fate awaits us here.

The warp is a sly and insidious beast, Lord Captain. We are ready to acknowledge that now. It was pleased that we admitted our defeat. That is why it let us come back. And we believe there can be only one reason for that — an even worse fate awaits us here.

languages.text: La disformidad es una bestia astuta y traicionera, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Ahora estamos en posición de confirmarlo. Le ha alegrado que aceptemos la derrota y por eso nos ha dejado volver. Y eso solo puede significar una cosa: lo que nos espera aquí es aún peor.
languages.original_text: The warp is a sly and insidious beast, Lord Captain. We are ready to acknowledge that now. It was pleased that we admitted our defeat. That is why it let us come back. And we believe there can be only one reason for that — an even worse fate awaits us here.

traits.locale_text: La disformidad es una bestia astuta y traicionera, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Ahora estamos en posición de confirmarlo. Le ha alegrado que aceptemos la derrota y por eso nos ha dejado volver. Y eso solo puede significar una cosa: lo que nos espera aquí es aún peor.

languages.text: 亚空间是一头狡猾而阴险的凶兽，舰长大人，我们亲身体会到了这一点。我们承认了我们的失败，它很开心，因此它才会放我们回来。而且我们相信，我们之所以能回来，只有一个原因——这边有更糟糕的命运在等着我们。
languages.original_text: The warp is a sly and insidious beast, Lord Captain. We are ready to acknowledge that now. It was pleased that we admitted our defeat. That is why it let us come back. And we believe there can be only one reason for that — an even worse fate awaits us here.

traits.locale_text: 亚空间是一头狡猾而阴险的凶兽，舰长大人，我们亲身体会到了这一点。我们承认了我们的失败，它很开心，因此它才会放我们回来。而且我们相信，我们之所以能回来，只有一个原因——这边有更糟糕的命运在等着我们。

languages.text: 歪みは狡猾で陰湿な獣です、ロード・キャプテン。我々は今、それを認めざるを得ません。ソレは、私達が敗北を認めたことを喜んだのでしょう。だからこそ、私達は戻ってこられるのです。そして、その理由はただ1つだと私達は信じています。ここでは、もっとひどい運命が待ち受けているのだと。
languages.original_text: The warp is a sly and insidious beast, Lord Captain. We are ready to acknowledge that now. It was pleased that we admitted our defeat. That is why it let us come back. And we believe there can be only one reason for that — an even worse fate awaits us here.

traits.locale_text: 歪みは狡猾で陰湿な獣です、ロード・キャプテン。我々は今、それを認めざるを得ません。ソレは、私達が敗北を認めたことを喜んだのでしょう。だからこそ、私達は戻ってこられるのです。そして、その理由はただ1つだと私達は信じています。ここでは、もっとひどい運命が待ち受けているのだと。

languages.text: Der Warp ist eine heimtückische Bestie, Lord Captain. Wir sind jetzt bereit, das anzuerkennen. Es war erfreut, dass wir unsere Niederlage zugaben. Deshalb ließ sie uns zurückkehren. Und wir glauben, dass es dafür nur einen Grund geben kann — ein noch schlimmeres Schicksal erwartet uns hier.
languages.original_text: The warp is a sly and insidious beast, Lord Captain. We are ready to acknowledge that now. It was pleased that we admitted our defeat. That is why it let us come back. And we believe there can be only one reason for that — an even worse fate awaits us here.

languages.text: Le Warp est une bête sournoise et insidieuse, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous en convenons à présent. Il a accueilli notre défaite avec une grande satisfaction. C'est pourquoi il nous a laissés revenir. Et il ne peut y avoir qu'une seule vraie raison à cela : un destin encore plus tragique nous attend ici.
languages.original_text: The warp is a sly and insidious beast, Lord Captain. We are ready to acknowledge that now. It was pleased that we admitted our defeat. That is why it let us come back. And we believe there can be only one reason for that — an even worse fate awaits us here.

traits.locale_text: Le Warp est une bête sournoise et insidieuse, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous en convenons à présent. Il a accueilli notre défaite avec une grande satisfaction. C'est pourquoi il nous a laissés revenir. Et il ne peut y avoir qu'une seule vraie raison à cela : un destin encore plus tragique nous attend ici.

languages.text: Öteboyut, sinsi ve hilekâr bir yaratıktır Lord Kaptan. Artık bunu kabullenmeye hazırız. Mağlubiyetimizi kabul etmemiz onu memnun etti. Bu yüzden dönmemize izin verdi. Bunun da tek bir sebebi olabileceğine inanıyoruz: Burada bizi çok daha makûs bir kader bekliyor.
languages.original_text: The warp is a sly and insidious beast, Lord Captain. We are ready to acknowledge that now. It was pleased that we admitted our defeat. That is why it let us come back. And we believe there can be only one reason for that — an even worse fate awaits us here.

traits.locale_text: Öteboyut, sinsi ve hilekâr bir yaratıktır Lord Kaptan. Artık bunu kabullenmeye hazırız. Mağlubiyetimizi kabul etmemiz onu memnun etti. Bu yüzden dönmemize izin verdi. Bunun da tek bir sebebi olabileceğine inanıyoruz: Burada bizi çok daha makûs bir kader bekliyor.
